```{r setup, include=FALSE}
rairuoho<-"https://www.dipintothereef.com/uploads/3/7/3/5/37359245/rairuoho.txt"
data<-read.table(rairuoho,sep="",header=T)
data
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
data <- data[,-12:-13]
data$treatment[data$treatment=="nutrient"]<-"enriched"
head(data)
data<-unite(data,day,day3,day4,day5,day6,day7,day8, sep = ",", remove = TRUE, na.rm = FALSE)
data<-unite(data,spatial,spatial1,spatial2, sep = ",", remove = TRUE, na.rm = FALSE)
data

```
